languages.text: "Люди вокруг меня нервировали. Я не привык демонстрировать свои привязанности посторонним. Выставлять их напоказ. Тем более — тем, к кому я явился за податью и кого, вполне возможно, скоро приведу к правосудию. Быть в этот момент человеком, а не живой статуей — все равно что идти на бой без брони". {n}Соломон делает глубокий вдох.{/n} "Тогда внутри все свернулось в клубок и кричало, что я все делаю неправильно".

"The people around us were getting on my nerves. I'm not used to putting my affections on display for all the world to see, especially in front of people I collect tithes from, or might end up bringing to justice. In that moment, being human, and not a living statue, was like going into battle without armour." {n}He takes a deep breath.{/n} "Everything inside me twisted into a knot, screaming that I was doing it all wrong."
languages.original_text: "Люди вокруг меня нервировали. Я не привык демонстрировать свои привязанности посторонним. Выставлять их напоказ. Тем более — тем, к кому я явился за податью и кого, вполне возможно, скоро приведу к правосудию. Быть в этот момент человеком, а не живой статуей — все равно что идти на бой без брони". {n}Соломон делает глубокий вдох.{/n} "Тогда внутри все свернулось в клубок и кричало, что я все делаю неправильно".

traits.locale_text: "The people around us were getting on my nerves. I'm not used to putting my affections on display, flaunting them, especially not in front of those from whom I am to collect a tribute and whom I may end up bringing to justice. To be a human in such moments instead of a living statue is like going into battle without armour." {n}He takes a deep breath.{/n} "Everything inside me had twisted into a knot, screaming that I was doing it all wrong."

"The people around us were getting on my nerves. I'm not used to putting my affections on display, flaunting them, especially not in front of those from whom I am to collect a tribute and whom I may end up bringing to justice. To be a human in such moments instead of a living statue is like going into battle without armour." {n}He takes a deep breath.{/n} "Everything inside me had twisted into a knot, screaming that I was doing it all wrong."

I'm not used to putting my affections on display for all the world to see, especially in front of people I collect tithes from, or might end up bringing to justice. In that moment, being human, and not a living statue, was like going into battle without armour." {n}He takes a deep breath.{/n} "Everything inside me twisted into a knot, screaming that I was doing it all wrong."

In that moment, being human, and not a living statue, was like going into battle without armour." {n}He takes a deep breath.{/n} "Everything inside me twisted into a knot, screaming that I was doing it all wrong."

I'm not used to putting my affections on display for all the world to see, especially in front of people I collect tithes from, or might end up bringing to justice. In that moment, being human, and not a living statue, was like going into battle without armour." {n}He takes a deep breath.{/n} "Everything inside me twisted into a knot, screaming that I was doing it all wrong."

languages.text: "Die Leute, die uns umgaben, gingen mir auf die Nerven. Ich bin es nicht gewohnt, meine Gefühle offen zur Schau zu tragen, schon gar nicht vor Leuten, deren Zehnt ich eintreibe oder über die ich möglicherweise richten muss. Ein Mensch und keine lebende Statue zu sein, erschien mir in diesem Moment, als würde ich ohne Rüstung in die Schlacht ziehen. {n}Er atmet tief durch.{/n} "Alles in mir verknotete sich und schrie, dass ich alles falsch mache."
languages.original_text: "The people around us were getting on my nerves. I'm not used to putting my affections on display for all the world to see, especially in front of people I collect tithes from, or might end up bringing to justice. In that moment, being human, and not a living statue, was like going into battle without armour." {n}He takes a deep breath.{/n} "Everything inside me twisted into a knot, screaming that I was doing it all wrong."

traits.locale_text: "Die Leute, die uns umgaben, gingen mir auf die Nerven. Ich bin es nicht gewohnt, meine Gefühle offen zur Schau zu tragen, schon gar nicht vor Leuten, deren Zehnt ich eintreibe oder über die ich möglicherweise richten muss. Ein Mensch und keine lebende Statue zu sein, erschien mir in diesem Moment, als würde ich ohne Rüstung in die Schlacht ziehen. {n}Er atmet tief durch.{/n} "Alles in mir verknotete sich und schrie, dass ich alles falsch mache."

languages.text: « Les autres commençaient à m'énerver. Je n'ai pas l'habitude de faire étalage de mes affections, surtout pas devant des gens auxquels je prélève la dîme ou que je pourrais traduire en justice. Je suis un être humain, après tout, pas une machine. À ce moment, j'ai eu l'impression d'aller au combat sans armure. » {n}Il s'interrompt pour prendre une profonde inspiration.{/n} « J'avais l'estomac noué et tout en moi me hurlait que je m'y prenais n'importe comment. »
languages.original_text: "The people around us were getting on my nerves. I'm not used to putting my affections on display for all the world to see, especially in front of people I collect tithes from, or might end up bringing to justice. In that moment, being human, and not a living statue, was like going into battle without armour." {n}He takes a deep breath.{/n} "Everything inside me twisted into a knot, screaming that I was doing it all wrong."

traits.locale_text: « Les autres commençaient à m'énerver. Je n'ai pas l'habitude de faire étalage de mes affections, surtout pas devant des gens auxquels je prélève la dîme ou que je pourrais traduire en justice. Je suis un être humain, après tout, pas une machine. À ce moment, j'ai eu l'impression d'aller au combat sans armure. » {n}Il s'interrompt pour prendre une profonde inspiration.{/n} « J'avais l'estomac noué et tout en moi me hurlait que je m'y prenais n'importe comment. »

languages.text: “周围的人让我感到心烦意乱。我不习惯将内心展示给其他人，尤其是那些被我征收什一税的人，或是可能会被我绳之以法的人。在那一刻，我不再是冷冰冰的雕像，而是变成了有血有肉的普通人。这种感觉就像是不穿盔甲上战场一样。”{n}他深吸了一口气。{/n}“我的五脏六腑仿佛都打了结，我的内心在尖叫，说我千万不该这么做。”
languages.original_text: "The people around us were getting on my nerves. I'm not used to putting my affections on display for all the world to see, especially in front of people I collect tithes from, or might end up bringing to justice. In that moment, being human, and not a living statue, was like going into battle without armour." {n}He takes a deep breath.{/n} "Everything inside me twisted into a knot, screaming that I was doing it all wrong."

traits.locale_text: “周围的人让我感到心烦意乱。我不习惯将内心展示给其他人，尤其是那些被我征收什一税的人，或是可能会被我绳之以法的人。在那一刻，我不再是冷冰冰的雕像，而是变成了有血有肉的普通人。这种感觉就像是不穿盔甲上战场一样。”{n}他深吸了一口气。{/n}“我的五脏六腑仿佛都打了结，我的内心在尖叫，说我千万不该这么做。”

languages.text: «La gente que nos rodeaba me estaba sacando de mis casillas. No estoy acostumbrado a mostrar afecto en público, y menos delante de la gente cuyo diezmo recaudo o a la que puedo acabar ajusticiando. En ese momento, comportarme como un ser humano y no una estatua era como entrar en combate sin armadura». {n}Respira profundamente.{/n} «Todo mi ser estaba gritándome por dentro, diciendo que lo estaba haciendo todo mal».
languages.original_text: "The people around us were getting on my nerves. I'm not used to putting my affections on display for all the world to see, especially in front of people I collect tithes from, or might end up bringing to justice. In that moment, being human, and not a living statue, was like going into battle without armour." {n}He takes a deep breath.{/n} "Everything inside me twisted into a knot, screaming that I was doing it all wrong."

traits.locale_text: «La gente que nos rodeaba me estaba sacando de mis casillas. No estoy acostumbrado a mostrar afecto en público, y menos delante de la gente cuyo diezmo recaudo o a la que puedo acabar ajusticiando. En ese momento, comportarme como un ser humano y no una estatua era como entrar en combate sin armadura». {n}Respira profundamente.{/n} «Todo mi ser estaba gritándome por dentro, diciendo que lo estaba haciendo todo mal».

languages.text: 「周りの人たちは私の神経を逆なでしていました。自分の愛情を世界中の人に見せることには慣れていません。特に、自分が租税を集めたり、裁判にかけるかもしれない人たちの前ではなおさらです。あの瞬間、生きている彫像ではなく人間であるということは、鎧を身に着けずに戦いに臨むようなものでした」{n}彼は深呼吸をする。{/n}「私の中のすべてがねじれて、間違っていると叫んでいたのです」
languages.original_text: "The people around us were getting on my nerves. I'm not used to putting my affections on display for all the world to see, especially in front of people I collect tithes from, or might end up bringing to justice. In that moment, being human, and not a living statue, was like going into battle without armour." {n}He takes a deep breath.{/n} "Everything inside me twisted into a knot, screaming that I was doing it all wrong."

traits.locale_text: 「周りの人たちは私の神経を逆なでしていました。自分の愛情を世界中の人に見せることには慣れていません。特に、自分が租税を集めたり、裁判にかけるかもしれない人たちの前ではなおさらです。あの瞬間、生きている彫像ではなく人間であるということは、鎧を身に着けずに戦いに臨むようなものでした」{n}彼は深呼吸をする。{/n}「私の中のすべてがねじれて、間違っていると叫んでいたのです」

languages.text: "Etrafımızdakiler sinirimi bozuyordu. Hislerimi herkesin gözü önünde sergilemeye alışık değilim. Hele aşar topladığım ya da günün birinde yargılayabileceğim kimselerin yanında. O an yaşayan bir heykelden ziyade insan olmak, zırhsız savaşa girmek gibiydi." {n}Derin bir nefes alıyor.{/n} "İçimdeki her şey düğüm düğüm oldu, her şeyin yanlış olduğunu haykırdı."
languages.original_text: "The people around us were getting on my nerves. I'm not used to putting my affections on display for all the world to see, especially in front of people I collect tithes from, or might end up bringing to justice. In that moment, being human, and not a living statue, was like going into battle without armour." {n}He takes a deep breath.{/n} "Everything inside me twisted into a knot, screaming that I was doing it all wrong."

traits.locale_text: "Etrafımızdakiler sinirimi bozuyordu. Hislerimi herkesin gözü önünde sergilemeye alışık değilim. Hele aşar topladığım ya da günün birinde yargılayabileceğim kimselerin yanında. O an yaşayan bir heykelden ziyade insan olmak, zırhsız savaşa girmek gibiydi." {n}Derin bir nefes alır.{/n} "İçimdeki her şey düğüm düğüm oldu, her şeyin yanlış olduğunu haykırdı."
